name: Starry Night Saree
barcode: oc00114, oc00114mblue
short_description: Van Gogh's starry night saree.
description:
Large blossom branches like this against a blue sky were one of Van Gogh’s favourite subjects. Almond trees flower early in the spring making them a symbol of new life. Van Gogh borrowed the subject, the bold outlines and the positioning of the tree in the picture plane from Japanese printmaking. And here we have used this timeless art on mul cotton to create this piece.

Product Details:
- Type: Mul cotton
- Length: 5.5 meters
- Width: 45 inches
- Blouse piece: No
- Saree finishing: The saree requires pico and fall
- Pack contains: 1 saree
tags: Oikkyo, Quirky, Van Gogh,Unique
occasions: Casual Wear, Party Wear, Ethnic, Street Wear, fashion events, fashion week, red carpet, indian festivities, art events, launch party, art gallery, international fashion events

name: I'M A TRADWIFE- CROCHET BOHO VEST
material: SOFT COTTON YARN AND TRADITIONAL LACES
barcode: ijg11, ijg11xsgreen, ijg11sgreen, ijg11mgreen, ijg11lgreen, ijg11xlgreen
short_description: CROCHET HANDCRAFTED UNISEX VEST FOR SUMMERS MADE OF SOFT COTTON YARN
description: The “I’m a Tradwife” vest is a slow-made masterpiece — meticulously handcrafted over weeks using traditional crochet and lace techniques, with every floral motif and open stitch placed with intention. It’s not just fashion — it’s a quiet rebellion stitched in thread.Delicate lace panels meet intricately crocheted 3D flowers, coming together in a silhouette that channels vintage romance with a modern boho soul. Lightweight and layer-friendly, it’s perfect worn over shirts or bare skin — whether you’re wandering through a market or dancing barefoot in the desert.
tags: CROCHET, BOHO, SUMMER, UNISEX, VEST, lace, green, floral motif, lightweight

name: I'M A GOLD DIGGER- GOLDEN MICRO SHORTS
material: GOLDEN GOTTA FLOWER WITH SOFT COTTON YARN CROCHET BASE
barcode: ijg12, ijg12xsxlgreen, ijg12xsgreen, ijg12sgreen, ijg12mgreen, ijg12lgreen, ijg12xlgreen
short_description: HANCRAFTED GOLDEN MICRO SHORTS WITH CROCHET BASE
description: The “I’m a gold digger” micro shorts are made for the girl who doesn't ask for attention, she commands it. Crafted entirely by hand, each pair is built from shimmering golden gota flowers, lined with custom crochet work for a layered, artisan twist on ultra-modern sensuality.The micro silhouette is cut to empower — high on the thigh, low on inhibition — while the delicate crochet trim softens the edge with subtle texture and craftsmanship. The saree is meticulously made from the finest silk organza fabric, offering a luxurious drape that exudes sophistication. Adorned with intricate cotton dori work, this saree beautifully blends tradition with contemporary design. Each flower is meticulously crafted, bringing a dimensional charm that makes this saree truly one-of-a-kind. Perfect for special occasions or as a statement piece in your wardrobe, this saree captures the essence of elegance and modernity, ensuring you stand out with every wear.

Perfect for those who embrace minimalism with a statement.

name: Sunflowers Saree
barcode: oc00111, oc00111mblue
short_description: Inspired from Van Gogh's Starry Night, we have used the mul cotton saree as a canvas.
description:
Van Gogh’s paintings of Sunflowers are among his most famous. He did them in Arles, in the south of France, in 1888 and 1889. Vincent painted a total of five large canvases with sunflowers in a vase, with three shades of yellow ‘and nothing else’. In this way, he demonstrated that it was possible to create an image with numerous variations of a single colour, without any loss of eloquence. And here we have used this timeless art on mul cotton to create this piece.

Product Details:
- Type: Mul cotton
- Length: 5.5 meters
- Width: 45 inches
- Blouse piece: No
- Saree finishing: The saree requires pico and fall
- Pack contains: 1 saree
tags: Oikkyo, Quirky, Van Gogh,Unique
occasions: Casual Wear, Party Wear, Ethnic, Street Wear, fashion events, fashion week, red carpet, indian festivities, art events, launch party, art gallery, international fashion events

name: Wheatfield And Van Gogh Self Portrait
barcode: oc00113, oc00113mmulticolor
short_description: Inspired from Van Gogh's Starry Night, we have used the mul cotton saree as a canvas.
description:
Cypresses gained ground in Van Gogh’s work by late June 1889 when he resolved to devote one of his first series in Saint-Rémy to the towering trees. Distinctive for their rich impasto, his exuberant on-the-spot studies include the Met’s close-up vertical view of cypresses and this majestic horizontal composition, which he illustrated in reed-pen drawings sent to his brother.

For the saree's body we mixed the sky from 'Wheat Field with Cypresses' and the field from 'Wheat Field Under Thunderclouds'. The self portrait of Vincent Van Gogh adds more class to this piece.

Dutch Post-Impressionist painter Vincent van Gogh painted a self-portrait in oil on canvas in September 1889. The work, which may have been Van Gogh's last self-portrait, was painted shortly before he left Saint-Rémy-de-Provencein southern France. The painting is now at the Musée d'Orsay in Paris. And here we have used this timeless art on mul cotton to create this piece.

Product Details:
- Type: Mul cotton
- Length: 5.5 meters
- Width: 45 inches
- Blouse piece: No
- Saree finishing: The saree requires pico and fall
- Pack contains: 1 saree

short_description: The Cosmo jacket set features a semi-fitted jacket paired with shorts. It showcases origami-inspired pleats, organic ruffle-like details, and bell sleeves. The design includes an elasticated hem and cuffs, a center front zipper closure, and a structured yet playful silhouette, blending form and function with contemporary flair and thoughtful textural contrasts.
description:
The Cosmo Jacket Set is a bold and sculptural ensemble that pairs a semi-fitted jacket with coordinating shorts, seamlessly blending sustainable innovation with avant-garde design. Inspired by the clean geometry of origami, the jacket features intricate pleats and organic ruffle-like detailing that add rhythm, movement, and visual interest to the garment.

SHIPPING TIME: 21 working days

Crafted from a combination of R|Elan™ Greengold — made from 100% recycled polyester sourced from post-consumer PET bottles — and GRS-certified recycled polyester, the set embodies a commitment to conscious material sourcing without compromising on structure or style. The jacket’s silhouette is structured yet playful, enhanced by dramatic bell sleeves, elasticated hem and cuffs, and a center front zipper closure for ease of wear. These elements strike a dynamic balance between form and function, offering both comfort and a distinct visual identity. The coordinating shorts continue the language of texture and movement, rounding out the look with a modern edge. Together, the set delivers a statement in sustainable fashion, fusing thoughtful design, tactile contrast, and a refined yet expressive aesthetic ideal for contemporary wardrobes.

description:
This look presents a striking interplay of structure and softness through a thoughtfully constructed asymmetrical jacket and relaxed-fit pants set. Crafted from multi-panel pleated textiles in varied sizes, the ensemble plays with proportion, movement, and texture—offering a rich visual and tactile experience.

SHIPPING TIME: 18 working days

The asymmetrical jacket features a sculptural lapel, a front snap-button closure, and two functional side pockets, blending utilitarian details with a bold, fashion-forward silhouette. The asymmetry adds an element of unpredictability, creating a garment that feels both grounded and experimental. Complementing the jacket, the relaxed pants are designed for ease and versatility, with an elasticated waistband that allows for a comfortable fit without compromising on style. The loose yet deliberate cut enhances the set’s dynamic silhouette, offering a sense of effortless fluidity. Both the shell and lining fabrics are made using R|Elan™ Greengold, a 100% recycled polyester derived from post-consumer PET bottles, reinforcing the set’s commitment to circular design. The lining also incorporates certified organic cotton, providing breathability and a soft touch against the skin. Balancing innovation with sustainability, structure with movement, this ensemble is a statement in contemporary design—purposeful, elevated, and conscious.

description:
This look redefines contemporary ease with a tailored yet breathable blazer-style shirt and lenticular-effect pants, designed to deliver comfort, movement, and modern sophistication in every season. The shirt takes on a minimalist silhouette with a clean center front snap button closure, exuding a refined, polished vibe while remaining exceptionally lightweight. A plain white back panel enhances breathability and lends contrast to the structured front—making it ideal for summer wear and layering across seasons. Paired with it, the lenticular pants add subtle dimensionality and visual intrigue. Featuring a center front zipper and an elasticated waistband, the pants offer a balanced fusion of structure and flexibility. The lenticular effect gives the surface an evolving quality with movement, adding textural dynamism to an otherwise simple cut.

SHIPPING TIME: 14 working days

Both pieces are crafted from R|Elan™ Greengold, made from 100% recycled polyester sourced from post-consumer PET bottles, and lined with a combination of R|Elan™ Greengold and certified organic cotton for softness, breathability, and environmental responsibility. Effortlessly versatile and future-forward, this look is a seasonless statement in sustainable tailoring, designed for those who seek comfort without compromising on character or conscious material choices.

The fabric forms a unique 3D blade-like texture, adding depth and visual intrigue. Its sculptural surface enhances the silhouette while embodying Pieux’s commitment to sustainable innovation and creative exploration, making it both environmentally conscious and visually striking.
description:
Born from spontaneous experimentation with pleats and tucks, this piece is a testament to accidental discovery as a design method. What began as a material study evolved into a strikingly sculptural form—featuring a distinct 3D blade-like texture that adds both visual tension and architectural depth to the silhouette.

SHIPPING TIME: 14 working days

Crafted from R|Elan™ Greengold, a 100% recycled polyester made from post-consumer PET bottles, the garment reflects Pieux’s commitment to sustainable innovation. The textural surface not only plays with light and shadow but also reshapes the body in motion, giving the piece a futuristic, almost kinetic energy. It is both environmentally responsible and visually compelling, elevating sustainable fashion into the realm of creative exploration. The lining, also made from R|Elan™ Greengold, maintains the integrity of the garment’s eco-conscious approach while ensuring lightweight comfort and structural support. Ideal for those drawn to material experimentation and bold silhouettes, this piece exists at the intersection of form, texture, and intention—a wearable artifact of design process and planetary care.

short_description: Pleated boxy Bomber jacket with rubber cuff and hem has been paired up with a white elasticated pants with pleated side seam panels. The pleats on the Bomber jacket have been printed on one side to create illusion. There are also 2 pockets in the front. Jacket has a front metal zipper opening.
description:
This contemporary co-ord set blends comfort, innovation, and sustainability with striking textural details. It features a pleated boxy bomber jacket paired with white elasticated pants, forming a bold yet wearable statement.

SHIPPING TIME: 14 working days

The bomber jacket is crafted from R|Elan™ Greengold recycled polyester and finished with certified organic cotton ribbed cuffs and hem, giving it both structure and flexibility. Its pleated panels are printed on one side, creating an optical illusion when seen from different angles—adding depth and visual intrigue. The jacket also includes a center front metal zipper and two functional front pockets, balancing practicality with artistic design. Paired with it, the pants feature side-seam pleated panels that echo the jacket’s sculptural quality. The elasticated waistband ensures ease of movement, making this look as functional as it is expressive. The shell is made of R|Elan™ Greengold while the lining uses certified organic cotton, ensuring breathability and comfort against the skin. Inside, the jacket is lined with R|Elan™ Feelfresh Fusion Fabric—a 100% recycled polyester with antimicrobial properties, making it not just sustainable, but also performance-ready. Together, this set offers a clean silhouette elevated by experimental pleating, eco-conscious materials, and dynamic design—a perfect harmony of fashion-forward aesthetics and mindful innovation.

short_description: A textile block Bomber jacket with CARTEX and pleated panels has been paired up with a printed t-shirt and printed pants with front zipper and button opening. The pleats on the jacket have 2 different colours on either side, which create an illusion if seen from different angles. The jacket has a front zipper opening.
description:
This innovative bomber jacket features a unique shell fabric blend of CARTEX — a 100% upcycled carpet waste handloom textile composed of nylon and cotton — paired with R|Elan™ Greengold, made from 100% recycled polyester derived from post-consumer PET bottles. The lining utilizes R|Elan™ Feelfresh Fusion Fabric, a 100% recycled polyester with added anti-microbial properties, ensuring both comfort and freshness. The jacket showcases pleated panels with two different colors on either side, creating a captivating color illusion that shifts depending on the viewing angle. It features a front zipper closure for easy wear. The accompanying printed t-shirt is crafted from R|Elan™ Feelfresh Fusion Fabric, offering the same recycled polyester base with anti-microbial benefits for enhanced comfort and sustainability. Printed pants complement the look, made from R|Elan™ Greengold fabric, ensuring eco-conscious production using 100% recycled polyester from post-consumer PET bottles. The pants are lined with certified organic cotton for added comfort and breathability and include a front zipper and button opening for practicality. Please note, the color of the CARTEX fabric may vary slightly due to its upcycled nature, making each jacket truly one-of-a-kind.

SHIPPING TIME: 18 working days

barcode: m2201, m2201smulticolor, m2201mmulticolor, m2201lmulticolor
short_description: A colour block printed sweatshirt with pleated side panels on the front and back. Pieux official pattern has been created on the handloom CARTEX textile which have been added on the front, back and sleeves. Pleats have been printed on both the sides creating an illusion of colours. There is a cut pocket in the front and 1 cargo patch pocket on each sleeve. The sweatshirt has diagonal zipper openings that start from the collar and end on the chest. Sweatshirt has been paired up with elasticated printed shorts and CARTEX details.
description:
This bold and richly textural ensemble reimagines streetwear through the lens of sustainability and visual storytelling. The look features a colour-block printed sweatshirt with pleated side panels on both the front and back, creating a dynamic illusion of shifting colors. At its core, the piece is a showcase of Pieux’s signature pattern, carefully printed on handloomed CARTEX—a unique textile crafted from 100% upcycled carpet waste, blending nylon and cotton into a richly tactile surface. The sweatshirt is further accentuated with diagonal zipper openings starting from the collar and ending at the chest, lending a futuristic and functional edge. A cut pocket on the front and cargo patch pockets on each sleeve add utilitarian flair, while the pleats on both sides deepen the visual experience with changing tones and shadowplay. The look is completed with elasticated printed shorts, also incorporating CARTEX textile detailing for a cohesive aesthetic. The fusion of R|Elan™ Greengold (100% recycled polyester made from post-consumer PET bottles), certified recycled nylon, and organic cotton linings ensures that both pieces are as conscious in composition as they are expressive in design. This ensemble stands as a vivid statement of sustainable innovation, comfort, and contemporary form, merging tactile experimentation with circular material narratives.

SHIPPING TIME: 18 working days

This one-of-a-kind upcycled shirt dress is a poetic blend of heritage craftsmanship and bold sustainability. Reconstructed from a damaged Chikankari saree generously donated to Pieux, the piece preserves the intricate hand embroidery while reimagining it through a contemporary silhouette. Each cut is placed with intention, celebrating the delicate artistry of the original textile. Soft, breathable, and timeless, this exclusive piece embodies the ethos of giving forgotten materials new purpose, honoring both cultural legacy and circular fashion innovation. A gentle rebellion against waste—rooted in care, story, and detail.

SHIPPING TIME: 5 working days

Crafted with printed and pleated panels, the jacket plays with depth and movement—each pleat printed on one side to create an illusion of shifting colours as the viewer changes perspective. The silhouette draws inspiration from traditional kimono forms, reinterpreted for modern-day wear through its short cropped cut and sculptural surface detailing. description: This vibrant two-piece set includes a corset-panelled bomber jacket and printed zipper-front pants, crafted to merge textural depth with planet-first design. The bomber jacket is constructed from CARTEX — a handloom textile made from 100% upcycled carpet waste yarns, predominantly wool, making each piece one-of-a-kind. With pleats printed on one side, the fabric creates a visual illusion, shifting in color and tone as you move. The corset-like panelling on both the front and back adds shape and sculptural drama to its otherwise fluid silhouette. Finished with nickel- and lead-free metal zipper, the jacket balances strength with sensitivity. The R|Elan™ Feelfresh Fusion lining provides anti-microbial functionality for comfortable daily wear. SHIPPING TIME: 14 working days Paired with the jacket are printed pants made from R|Elan™ Greengold (100% recycled polyester from post-consumer PET bottles) and certified organic cotton lining. Designed with a front zipper and a coconut shell button, the pants offer a sustainable take on classic tailoring. Together, the ensemble diverts dozens of plastic bottles and textile waste from landfills, showcasing Pieux's commitment to circular fashion, environmental consciousness, and striking craftsmanship. Note: CARTEX’s unique coloring and texture depend on the original yarns salvaged from discarded carpets, ensuring each garment is entirely unique. Total bottles recycled: ~92

description: Bold, sculptural, and environmentally conscious, this three-piece co-ord set includes a semi-fitted pleated blazer, a matching bralette, and shorts, each crafted from R|Elan™ Greengold (100% recycled polyester made from post-consumer PET bottles) and certified organic cotton lining. Together, the set gives 108 plastic bottles a second life—reimagined as fashion-forward design with circular responsibility. The blazer features precision pleats that are printed on one side, creating a color-shifting illusion effect that changes with movement. It includes a front opening with two front and two back pockets—balancing tailoring with utility. The bralette mirrors the blazer's base material and is secured with a hook-and-eye fastening, offering breathable support and versatility. The shorts, constructed from leftover pleated textile panels, further embrace upcycling while maintaining a cohesive aesthetic. With a nickel- and lead-free metal front zipper and comfortable fit, they tie the look together in both form and function. This ensemble is not only a showcase of creative pleating and structural design, but also of impactful sustainability, giving new purpose to 108 post-consumer PET bottles. It's fashion with intention—playful in silhouette, serious in mission. SHIPPING TIME: 14 working days

name: Lucie inverted shirt dress with bell sleeves
material: Shirt dress Shell fabric: Certified organic cotton twill.
short_description: It is a shirt dress with a twist. Multi layered bell sleeves add drama to the look. The shirt dress has a small panel on the bottom left that resembles a folded shirt. This panel acts as a pocket with buttons stitched to it. Collar of this small shirt has a cut through which legs are visible. The sleeves of the small shirt are stitched all the way to the centre back where it has been knotted together.
description: This conceptual white shirt dress transforms a wardrobe staple into an avant-garde statement through unexpected detailing and sculptural design. Made from certified organic cotton twill, the dress retains a soft structure while ensuring comfort and sustainability. The silhouette plays with familiar forms in unfamiliar ways: multi-layered bell sleeves cascade down the arms, adding volume, movement, and dramatic flair. A standout feature is the integrated shirt panel stitched at the lower left hem—complete with its own collar, buttons, and sleeves—resembling a folded shirt wrapped into the garment. This panel cleverly functions as a pocket, merging form with utility. The miniature shirt’s sleeves extend from the front panel to the center back, where they are knotted together—a poetic gesture that subtly references binding, transformation, and the cyclical nature of clothing. A cutout in the shirt collar reveals a glimpse of the leg, breaking the symmetry and drawing attention to layered interactions. Fastened with natural seashell buttons, this shirt dress bridges storytelling, sculpture, and sustainability, offering a playful yet refined reimagining of classic shirting. SHIPPING TIME: 7 working days

material: Shirt Shell fabric: Certified organic cotton andR|Elan™ Greengold ( 100% Recycledpolyester made from post-consumer PETBottles)
short_description: A buttoned down white shirt with details that makes it a very unique shirt. Details like an asymmetrical collar with a pocket, a cut on the left shoulder, belt on the cuff, detachable modular sleeves, slit on the side seams and piping on the back makes it a very unusual but wearable shirt.
description: This is not just a shirt—it's an architectural statement. Designed in off-white and crafted from certified organic cotton and R|Elan™ Greengold (100% recycled polyester made from post-consumer PET bottles), this piece redefines what a classic button-down can be. At first glance, it appears simple. But look closer: an asymmetrical collar, a chest pocket built into the irregular neckline, and a cut-out on the left shoulder introduce an element of deconstruction. Modular, detachable sleeves allow for transformation—from long to short—depending on mood or weather, while a functional belt detail on the cuff adds subtle structure and adjustability. The side seam slits enhance movement, and contrast piping at the back subtly highlights the silhouette. Fastened with natural wooden buttons, this shirt merges avant-garde detailing with functionality, making it equally wearable as a standalone piece or as part of a layered ensemble. It’s experimental, modular, and eco-conscious—a future-forward essential for those who value sustainability, adaptability, and design clarity. SHIPPING TIME: 7 working days

name: Noir Messenger Bag
material: Shell fabric: R|Elan™ Greengold ( 100% Recycled polyester made from postconsumerPET Bottles) and surplus leftover textiles.Lining: Certified recycled polyester
short_description: Quilted strips have been hand weaved together to form a classic messenger bag with an additional strap to hang it as a shoulder bag as well. Internal slip pockets make it more functional and useful. There are a total of 5 pockets and a compartment for a mini laptop/tablet.
description:
This handwoven messenger bag redefines functionality with a deep commitment to sustainability. Constructed from quilted strips of R|Elan™ Greengold (100% recycled polyester made from post-consumer PET bottles) and surplus leftover textiles, the bag showcases Pieux’s approach to resourceful design—giving new life to what would otherwise be discarded. Each strip is meticulously handwoven to form a structured yet tactile surface, balancing craft and utility. The bag’s versatile form includes both a classic messenger strap and an additional shoulder strap, making it easily adaptable for different carrying styles. Designed with thoughtful organization in mind, the bag contains five functional pockets and a dedicated compartment for a mini laptop or tablet, along with internal slip pockets to keep essentials in place. A nickel-free zipper opening secures the main compartment, aligning with the brand’s attention to safe and sustainable fastenings. Finished in a sleek black and off-white colorway, this bag is not only a stylish everyday companion but also an environmental statement—crafted from the equivalent of 18 recycled water bottles.

SHIPPING TIME: 7 working days

barcode: m23122, m23122xsmulticolor, m23122smulticolor, m23122mmulticolor, m23122lmulticolor
short_description: This collectible jacket is crafted by weaving tubes of recycled and upcycled quilted materials, designed without side seams or inseams for a seamless silhouette. Voluminous and warm, it offers exceptional warmth in cold weather. A standout piece from the collection, it embodies sustainability, craftsmanship, and sculptural innovation in one bold design.
description:
This collectible jacket redefines sustainable luxury through sculptural innovation and conscious design. Meticulously crafted by weaving tubes of recycled and upcycled quilted materials, the jacket eliminates traditional side seams and inseams, resulting in a fluid, uninterrupted silhouette that wraps the body in architectural warmth. Voluminous yet lightweight, the design offers exceptional insulation and comfort for cold climates, while making a powerful visual statement. The shell is made from R|Elan™ Greengold – 100% recycled polyester derived from post-consumer PET bottles – and the interior lining is composed of certified organic cotton, ensuring a low-impact, skin-friendly wear. A flagship piece in the collection, this jacket embodies the future of circular fashion, merging sustainability with high-concept craftsmanship.

SHIPPING TIME: 18 working days

short_description: A relaxed fit jacket with a hoodie cap. The jacket has drop shoulders and voluminous layered sleeves with elasticatiion at its cuff. The jacket has elasticated cord at its waist to add fit to it. There is a elasticated cord at the hem of the jacket to tighten the hem, if required. There is also an additional panel at the centre lower back which is hidden with the help of concealed zipper. The jacket has a centre front zipper opening. Jacket has been paired up with printed crop top and printed shorts.
description:
This contemporary three-piece set includes a relaxed-fit hoodie jacket, a printed crop top, and printed shorts, crafted from sustainable textiles with attention to functionality, volume, and comfort. The hooded jacket features drop shoulders, voluminous layered sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a center front zipper opening with nickel- and lead-free metal fastenings. The waist and hem are both adjustable via elasticated drawcords, allowing for personalized shaping. A hidden functional zipper panel at the lower back adds a modular and unexpected design detail. Made from certified recycled nylon and lined with certified organic cotton, the jacket is breathable yet protective.

SHIPPING TIME: 10 working days

The set is paired with a printed crop top and shorts. The crop top, crafted from R|Elan™ Greengold recycled polyester (made from post-consumer PET bottles) and certified organic cotton rib, zips up the front for ease and structure. The printed shorts, also made of certified recycled nylon with organic cotton lining, include a nickel- and lead-free metal zipper for secure fastening. This look merges comfort and construction with dynamic colors and conscious materials, embodying Pieux’s commitment to sustainability, technical creativity, and streetwear-inspired form.

Total bottles recycled (estimate): 72

name: Off White Slim Real Raffia Clutch
barcode: 06myw002, 06myw002moffwhite
short_description: An interesting raffia bag with a gold emblem that makes for stylish accessory - perfect for holidays.
description:

name: DIANA
barcode: dk1, dk1sdullgold
short_description: A refined brocade column dress with a vintage touch. The intricate gold detailing and sleek silhouette evoke an air of old world charm and sophistication. It can be worn at any of the formal events.
description: This opulent golden brocade dress draws deep inspiration from Indian heritage, echoing the grandeur of royal court ensembles. Crafted from rich silk brocade woven with intricate floral motifs, the fabric pays homage to traditional Banarasi weaves. The structured column silhouette with a flowing train evokes timeless elegance, while dramatic puff sleeves add a touch of baroque romanticism. The square neckline balances modern refinement with vintage sensibility, making it ideal for both ceremonial and editorial settings. Styled with a traditional choker, the look captures the essence of old-world royalty reimagined for the contemporary woman. Every detail in this ensemble celebrates India’s textile legacy through a couture lens.
tags: dress, midi dress, straight dress, indian dress, royal dress, vintage look, floral motif
occasions: Cocktail wer, wedding reception, sundowners

name: CHARLOTTE SET
barcode: dk4, dk4xsmulticolor, dk4smulticolor, dk4mmulticolor, dk4lmulticolor
short_description: Crafted in a striking red and black tartan checkered fabric, the ensemble features a sharp double breasted cropped waistcoat adorned with gold tone military buttons, paired with high waisted wide leg trousers that elongate the silhouette with effortless drama. The look is anchored by a commanding full length trench coat, tailored with a strong shoulder and structured lapels
description: This look is a bold reinterpretation of heritage checks, fusing British tailoring with Indian sartorial elegance. Crafted in rich red Scottish tartan, the ensemble comprises a sharply tailored blazer, flared pants, and an elongated trench-style overcoat draped effortlessly over the shoulders. The powerful check pattern—traditionally symbolic of lineage and identity—gets a contemporary makeover with structured silhouettes and precise cuts. A subtle play of masculine authority and feminine grace defines the mood, evoking 1940s glamour with modern edge. The styling, with vintage waves and minimal accessories, allows the plaid to speak volumes. It's a celebration of tradition, attitude, and striking individuality.
tags: checkered set, co-ord set, satin set, suit set, red set, red, waistcoat, blazer, trousers, trench style overcoat
occasions: Winter Dinners, fashion Weeks, Day time soiree

short_description: Breeze through sunlit days in the Neelam Leher Skirt, crafted from layers of soft, sky blue tulle. The flowing silhouette is embellished with delicate bow beadwork and sequin embroidery, evoking the gentle sparkle of rippling water. A gathered waistband ensures comfort and a flattering fit, perfect for daytime outings and festive celebrations.
description: This whimsical summer ensemble radiates playful charm with a couture twist. The look pairs a crisp white tunic adorned with a regal crest-style embroidery featuring a blue bow and beetle—reminiscent of vintage heraldry and nature-inspired motifs—with a voluminous powder blue tulle skirt. The skirt’s layered silhouette, embellished delicately with miniature bows, evokes the lightness of a ballerina’s tutu, bringing in dreamlike femininity. A soft organza neck scarf in matching blue adds a romantic, old-school touch, while mustard yellow embellished mules offer a cheerful pop of contrast. This look is a perfect blend of nostalgic sweetness and modern statement, made for a sunlit garden affair.
tags: skirt, flowy skirt, blue skirt, light skirt, tiered skirt

description: This vibrant look captures the spirit of a playful garden fête with couture finesse. A crisp white T-shirt, embroidered with intricately detailed fruits and flowers, brings an artisanal charm and nature-inspired whimsy to the ensemble. Paired with a voluminous blush pink tulle skirt that sways with every step, the outfit effortlessly blends casual comfort with high-fashion fantasy. A deep maroon velvet waistband anchors the softness, adding definition and vintage elegance. Accessories like pearl layers, floral brooches, white retro sunglasses, and embellished heels add a fun, eclectic energy. description: Set against an urban skyline, this ensemble brings together the grit of city life with the softness of couture fantasy. The black oversized T-shirt, embellished with a beaded motif of a bow, introduces a touch of sparkle while anchoring the look in contemporary streetwear. Paired with a voluminous dove-grey tulle skirt that flows like a dream, the outfit becomes a statement in contrasts—bold yet delicate, structured yet free. name: ALEXANDRIA JACKET
barcode: dk2, dk2xsblack, dk2sblack, dk2mblack, dk2lblack
short_description: the Alexandra organza top is a dreamy blend of ethereal elegance and modern allure adorn with delicate crystal stars and intricate floral drape. It’s cloud like structures gracefully create a soft sculptural silhouette that captures both fluidity and form in one breathtaking piece.
description: This dramatic couture piece from Duchess Kumari India is a sculptural celebration of floral opulence and high craftsmanship. Inspired by the richness of Indian ceremonial blooms and haute couture detailing, the entire garment is encrusted with three-dimensional satin roses. Each flower is meticulously hand-formed in deep black silk, with crystal-studded centres that resemble heirloom Indian jewelry, evoking the decadence of Mughal artistry. The voluminous silhouette and bold texture create a powerful, statuesque form—both romantic and commanding. Paired with statement earrings and an embellished headpiece, the look is a modern ode to royal Indian elegance reimagined for the runway. This creation speaks of drama, devotion, and deliberate design mastery.
tags: satin roses, roses top, 3d roses, full sleeves, black, crystal studded top, runway top
occasions: Editorial fashion shoots, Gala dinners, launch parties

name: MARGARET
barcode: dk3, dk3xsblack, dk3sblack, dk3mblack, dk3lblack
short_description: Designed to contour and celebrate the form, this sleek mermaid silhouette creates an effortlessly statuesque presence, flowing into a graceful flare and soft trail. The highlight a dramatic hand sculpted golden accent that cascades diagonally across the neckline and shoulder, forming a statement bow like flourish.
description: This sculptural black gown is a striking embodiment of modern elegance and couture precision. The silhouette, sleek and body-hugging through the bodice, flares into a dramatic mermaid hemline that cascades with fluid grace. What makes this piece truly iconic is the oversized golden bow, crafted in a finely pleated metallic fabric and dramatically sweeping across the shoulder and bust. The exaggerated bow, reminiscent of avant-garde haute couture, evokes the grandeur of ceremonial Indian drapes while making a bold, architectural statement. The interplay of rich matte black and radiant gold captures the balance of restraint and opulence. This gown is an ode to powerful femininity—poised, polished, and unforgettable.
tags: black gown, red carpet gown, sculptural dress, trail gown, bow, draped gown, golden accent
occasions: Red carpet, Fashion shows,High Profile events, gala Events, Cocktail parties

name: LEONARA Dress
barcode: dk11, dk11xsmustard, dk11smustard, dk11mmustard, dk11lmustard, dk11xlmustard
short_description: Leonara exhibits the finest edit in luxury with its warm tone and intricate craftmanship. A stunning blend of youthful charm and High fashion. Luxurious fabric, fine detailing and an impeccable shape creates a statement piece that is both playful and sophisticated. You can wear this dress to any of your dressy formal occasions.
description: This charming mustard yellow mini dress is a vibrant fusion of vintage school-girl innocence and Parisian chic. Made from lustrous structured fabric, the dress features flared sleeves and a crisp A-line silhouette that flatters with playful precision. Its standout detail—a row of bold black velvet bows cascading down the front—adds a dramatic graphic contrast, while the black collar lends a polished finish. The look is effortlessly styled with strappy black stilettos, allowing the dress to take center stage. Whimsical yet commanding, this ensemble is a joyful statement of confident femininity with a dash of theatrical flair.
tags: dress, mini dress, structured dress, mustard, bow detail , A-line, flared sleaves
occasions: Cocktails, Gallery openings, Theater nights

name: MAREN DRESS SET
barcode: dk12, dk12xsturquoise, dk12sturquoise, dk12mturquoise, dk12lturquoise, dk12xlturquoise
short_description: In the realm of fashion, this louder than life hue has the ability to stand out and exhibit a confident aura. This strappy square neck lined dress gives out a youthful appeal offering a bold look. A go to piece for every season. You can wear this lovely dress to your brunches, garden parties or any other fun gatherings.
description: This bold and structured ensemble is a masterclass in mid-century modern elegance reimagined for today. The turquoise blue sleeveless tunic top features a clean, squared neckline and a tailored A-line cut, creating a sculptural yet feminine silhouette. Its most striking detail—a vertical row of black velvet bows—adds playful dimension and contrast, echoing vintage couture charm. Paired with sleek high-waisted black flared trousers, the look evokes 1960s mod spirit with a contemporary silhouette. Finished with minimal black heels, this outfit strikes a perfect balance between boldness and refinement—ideal for the woman who embraces color, structure, and statement style.
tags: set, turquoise blue, dress, pants, bow detail, black, square neck, a-line cute, sleeveless, tunic top

short_description: Matilda is an intoxicating mix of luxury and sensuality embodying elegance. A celebration of beauty where fluidity and enhanced structure can truly shine together.
description: This radiant cobalt blue ensemble captures the essence of breezy elegance and festive charm. The off-shoulder crop top features dramatic gathered ruffles and delicate spaghetti straps, balancing bold volume with ethereal delicacy. Paired with a full-length skirt that boasts fine hand-pleated smocking along the high waistband, the outfit effortlessly blends comfort and couture craftsmanship. The structured sheen of the fabric reflects light beautifully, adding richness to its deep hue. Hidden pockets in the skirt lend functionality without compromising flair. Styled with statement earrings, this look is playful, polished, and perfect for both resort soirées and modern Indian celebrations.

name: Taj Shirt
barcode: astci004, astci004xsoffwhite, astci004soffwhite, astci004moffwhite, astci004loffwhite, astci004xloffwhite, astci0042xloffwhite
short_description: A tale of two Bombays—hand-painted in one shirt. The Taj Shirt brings together the grandeur of the first Taj Hotel with the resilience of Dharavi’s lived reality.
description: A tale of two Bombays—hand-painted in one shirt. The Taj Shirt brings together the grandeur of the first Taj Hotel with the resilience of Dharavi’s lived reality. On the front, clean lines and a hand-painted Taj reflect structure, pride, and legacy. Turn around, and the back tells a different story—raw edges, a tie-up detail, and hand-drawn homes that speak of ingenuity and survival. Just 12 km apart, these two worlds exist side by side. This shirt is a reminder of the contrasts we carry, and the strength that binds them.

name: The Jungle Tote
material: Cotton Canvas with a chic pure cotton printed lining.
barcode: actbjt, actbjtfreesizedustybrownandkhaki
short_description: A cotton canvas tote bag.
description:
There is a saying in the jungle. “You may have missed seeing the tiger, but the tiger hasn’t missed seeing you.”   The tiger will see you a hundred times before you see him once. Welcome to the Wild. What happens in the jungle stays in the jungle. Dark secrets, movement, the call of the sambar, tigers marking territories, tigers fighting for territories, tigresses protecting her cubs, the hunt. The Indian jungle is nature at its most raw, beautiful and carnal form.  Capturing the essence of the wild Indian jungle in its virgin, dusty green-brown, raw, untouched avatar, the Jungle Tote, celebrates the spirit of wilderness, with its real hero – the forest; in its rich biodiversity and diverse wildlife. And its characters – the Indian tiger, the mighty elephant, the cobra, the birds and the butterflies, the Sal and the Mahua tree.  An ode to the jungles of Bandhavgarh and Bagh Tola, the Jungle Tote, invites you to get lost in the maze of the Jungle.

FRONT: Hand-screen printed maze of the wild Indian jungle. 

BACK: Hand-screen printed visage of the wild Indian jungle with Art-chives logo

occasions: NA

barcode: alttp049, alttp049xxswhiteandblue, alttp049xswhiteandblue, alttp049swhiteandblue, alttp049mwhiteandblue, alttp049lwhiteandblue, alttp049xlwhiteandblue, alttp0492xlwhiteandblue
short_description: A white & blue eco-friendly dyed blazer with checks print.
description:
Elevate your wardrobe with this versatile blazer, made from luxurious handwoven kala cotton. Designed with a timeless notch collar, a stylish back slit, and an open front for a relaxed yet sophisticated fit, this piece effortlessly blends comfort and elegance.

HANDWOVEN KALA COTTON

  • Drought-resistant, purely rain-fed crop
  • No synthetic pesticides or fertilizers required in it's cultivation
  • Soft, breathable and durable
  • Supports local communities and preserves traditional agricultural and weaving practices

This fabric is dyed using non-toxic, eco friendly Azo-free dyes.

short_description: A ivory cotton/ linen waistcoat paired with high-low hem skirt.
description:
A co-ord made for spontaneous plans and slow conversations. She walks in wearing calm—tailored, feminine, effortlessly pulled together for a lingering afternoon that turns into evening. 

Tailored yet lighthearted, Afternoon Affair is a co-ord that blends the charm of vintage tailoring with the ease of modern wear. The waistcoat’s soft structure, fabric buttons, and pocket flaps meet a breezy high-low skirt that flows with movement — perfect for everything from Sunday brunch to sunset walks. The product consists of a cotton/ linen waistcoat & skirt

The model is wearing size XXS and stands at a height of 5'6"

Skirt Length: front - 23 inches, back - 34 inches
Waistcoat Length:- Front - 23 inches, Back- 20 inches

short_description: A relaxed, button-down oversized shirt with a high-low hem.
description:
A relaxed, button-down oversized shirt with subtle drama — think comfort with character. It’s for mornings that melt into evenings, and for women who carry their calm with quiet confidence. Crafted in soft handwoven cotton checks, this piece features a high-low hem, drop shoulders, and a back pleat cinched with a contrast loop. Its half-placket front and roomy sleeves make it endlessly layerable — over dresses, with pants, or tucked into stillness. Every Paeony outfit comes with thoughtfully placed pockets — because ease is always in style.

The model is wearing Free Size and stands at a height of 5'6"

Length: front- 31 inches, back- 34 inches
tags: Linen coordBold checksStatement summer set

short_description: A yellow checkered backless midi dress with a front slit.
description:
A scent, a memory, a dress. She slips into this and suddenly the room slows down. Feminine, fluid, and quietly bold — like something you’d write a love letter in. Handwoven in breathable cotton checks and cut on the bias, this backless summer dress flows with you. It features a soft knot at the neckline, cross-back straps, practical pockets, and delicate lace detailing at the hem. Madeline is your go-to for sunlit afternoons, slow gatherings, or just feeling beautifully yourself.

description:
No better way to make a statement this wedding season than with this elegant Mayuri Heer Lehenga Set. This set strikes the perfect balance between elegance and boldness. The intricate Emerald Green Chintz Print along with jaali print across the Crepe Silk flared skirt creates an opulent and radiant ensemble. The Lehenga is ornated with gota embellishments and dori with latkans to adjust the waist. The epitome of your Bollywood dreams, perfect for twirling on the dance floor! The sequin hand embroidered Crepe Silk Buti print blouse with elbow length sleeves adds a subtle shimmer, making this ensemble perfect for daytime festivities as well. The gota embellishments add opulence to the ensemble. The light, airy fabric ensures both comfort and style, making it ideal for long celebrations. Complete the lehenga with the stunning Emerald Green Organza dupatta, which is adorned with gold hand embroidery and scallop embroidery on all sides. Perfect choice for the bridesmaids or the bride's Mehendi,Sangeet Ceremony or a variety of rituals, this stunning lehenga is a manifestation of bridal perfection!
